words.def: strong woody fibers obtained especially from the phloem of from various plants
nocturnal mouselike mammal with forelimbs modified to form membranous wings and anatomical adaptations for echolocation by which they navigate
a soft silvery metallic element of the alkali earth group
nocturnal mouselike mammal with forelimbs modified to form membranous wings and anatomical adaptations for echolocation by which they navigate
To sabotage, especially fox hunts in opposition to blood.
the seventh and last day of the week
a hard grey lustrous metallic element that is highly resistant to corrosion
a soft silvery metallic element of the alkali earth group
a very poisonous metallic element that has three allotropic forms
a highly unstable radioactive element (the heaviest of the halogen series)
